bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of chuang 瘡 , sores, conditions that form peaks and reach deep into the tissue, with separate entities next to each other, and a poisonous root kept deep inside and boring through the interior. Pu ji fang 普濟方 288: 黃芩散，癌瘡爛腫化惡膿， 止痛活血，以洗之 , “The powder with huang qin is used for washing tumor sores with festering and swelling, and transforming to a malign putrescence. It ends the pain and quickens the blood”.
